name: Cultist Clicker
description:
My first Ludum Dare. My first game released to the public. Consider this my sacrifical lamb.

In Cultist Clicker you will click your way from simply sacrificing people with a knife to conjouring up some Harvester Demons to help in the effort. What are we sacrificing for I hear you ask... For the glory of seeing numbers get increasingly higher.

For those of you dearly interested in taking this games sphagetti code and turning in into a fine well oiled machine you can download the game on my GitHub page this does include some builds of the game where a few things are diffrent (mostly flip flopping between what suffix to put on the word sacrifice).
